show_error: This function will show a custom string as an error message and give the option to abort the game afterwards if necessary.
NOTE: This function is for debug use only.
The string to show in the pop-up message.

{ANY_CODE} if (room != rm_Dungeon)
{nbsp_x1} {nbsp_x1} {
{nbsp_x1} {nbsp_x1} show_error("Error: Went to wrong area. Aborting game.", true);
{nbsp_x1} {nbsp_x1} }
The above code will check to see if the room that the player is in is "rm_Dungeon" and if not it will show an error message and force the user to abort the game.
